Package duke.task

Class TaskList

  • java.lang.Object
    • duke.task.TaskList
  • public class TaskList
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the list of task items. This supports add, edit, delete operations. When a add, edit or delete operation is to be performed, the TaskList class provides an abstraction to support these operations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TaskList()
      Constructs a new list of tasks.
      TaskList​(java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> lines)
      Constructs a new list of tasks from a stream of line.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Appends the task to the end of the list of the tasks.

      Removes the task at the specified index from the list of tasks.
      java.lang.String done​(int index)
      Marks the task at the specified index from the list of tasks as done.
      java.lang.String find​(java.lang.String keyword)
      Finds all matching tasks with the given keyword.

      Returns a string representation of the list of tasks.

      Returns a stream of string to be saved into the Storage.
      int size()
      Returns the number of tasks in the list.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaskList

        public TaskList()
        Constructs a new list of tasks.

      • TaskList

        public TaskList​(java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> lines)
        Constructs a new list of tasks from a stream of line. This stream of lines will be parsed by FileLineParser to each individual tasks that will be added individually to form a list of tasks.
        Parameters:
        lines - the stream of lines to be parsed.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add​(Task task)
        Appends the task to the end of the list of the tasks.
        Parameters:
        task - the task to be appended to the list

      • delete

        public java.lang.String delete​(int index)
        Removes the task at the specified index from the list of tasks.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the task to be removed
        Returns:
        a string representation of the task removed to be printed on a user interface.

      • done

        public java.lang.String done​(int index)
        Marks the task at the specified index from the list of tasks as done.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the task to be done.
        Returns:
        a string representation of the done task to be be printed on a user interface.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of tasks in the list.
        Returns:
        the number of tasks in the list.

      • list

      • find

        public java.lang.String find​(java.lang.String keyword)
        Finds all matching tasks with the given keyword.
        Parameters:
        keyword - the keyword to look out for in tasks' description
        Returns:
        a string representation of the list of tasks that match the keyword

      • save

        public java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> save()
        Returns a stream of string to be saved into the Storage. Each task is parsed using a task parser. See TaskParser for more information.
        Returns:
        a stream of string to be saved into storage
